metadata.title: WEETIME Ethel Ernest Waterproof Bath Curtain Colorful Weed Leaf Forest Polyester Fabric Bathroom Shower Curtain 60 x 72 inch
features: Custom Design, Printed on Single Side
Gentle Hand Wash Separately in Cold Water
description: It is made of high quality which is the perfect choice for your bathroom.
It is waterproof and easy to dry after taking a shower.
Cool design makes you comfortable which you are taking a shower.
It is not faded and durable. Good bathroom decoration.
It includes 12 holes and printed on one side.
